description: Responsible of architecting and coding the core of the product, mentoring developers, reviewing code, and sharing knowledge about best practices. Our product was utilized by renowned companies like Disney Hotstar and Postman.

Responsible for thinking up and coding customized frontend & backend solutions tailored to meet specific requirements of the company's product. In charge of provide solutions that cannot be found elsewhere.

Founder of a small team of developers, overseeing decision-making, and backend developer. Focused on managing the entire architecture of the services we offered to our customers and leading my fellow founders.
Second time around. Close collaboration with graphic designers for websites and applications development for our customers, catering to various types of local businesses in Chile.
Freelance developer for 3 years, crafting websites and designing ui for my customers. Being aware of using the latest development tools and technologies for my projects.

Websites development using the latest web technologies at the time. Serving the needs of variety of local businesses such as laundries, hotels, real estate portals, metallurgical companies, highlighting well known companies in Chile like Cardinale.
